EmailTemplate.name: New Case -JP-EN
EmailTemplate.subject: 【We have received your inquiry】from DAZN - {!Case.Thread_Id}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!IF(Account.Partner_ID__c == "",Account.FirstName, "DAZN for docomo user")},
Thank you very much for your inquiry.
We've received your inquiry ID: {!Case.CaseNumber}.
Customer Inquiry: '{!Case.Description}'
A member of our customer service team will be in touch within 24 hours regarding your inquiry. In the meantime, you may find some helpful information on our help page (https://my.dazn.com/help/JP-en).
Ensuring that you enjoy DAZN is our priority.
Privacy Policy https://my.dazn.com/help/jp-en/privacy
Terms of Use https://my.dazn.com/help/jp-en/terms
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
